values:
Reality is My Enemy

Cradled by a singing dolphin
Deep in the purple sea
She sings me sweet lullabies
To help me fall asleep

I climb the branches of money trees
They grow tall in my yard
The countless leaves of wealth
All belong to me

A contemporary princess
I dance in a floor-length gown
Balls and masquerades each night
Crumpets and tea by day

I saunter down the red carpet
The people envy me
My co-star, Johnny Depp, arrives
We enter hand-in-hand

Illusions, dreams and fantasies
These are Utopia for me
They may never become true
Reality is my enemy

I know that I haven't posted in years, literally years! But I'm back! Looking back I am thinking I've become a much better writer, lol, woohoo! So here's some of the things that I've written recently. Hope you likes. Please leave some comments and love for me!
Bree

This is our night
Love, we've woven this too tight
Taking all so lit'rally
Not understanding humor things
Here is our chance
To leave stubborness in the past
So love me like you never had
Long gone we'll leave our trodden path
This is our night
All other things despite
Trust in me when I say
Our fuss is in it's end this day

A pitter patter
Of little feet
Can often be heard
Up on the roof
On this fine ever
Creeping is done
By a jolly old man
And 16 small hooves
While they're never caught
There are still many signs
To prove they were here
On this very night
The cookies were eaten
The milk had been drank
And appeared many gifts
Under the tree so bright
Socks had been filled
With trinkets and toys
And candy and fun
For all the girls and boys
Those who were good 
Got trains and dolls
But those who'd been bad
Got coal without choice
Up through the chimney
And into a sled
Onto the next house
Went old St. Nick

The rustle of someone
Following you home
But when you turn
Nothing is heard
Little, tiny children
Running about
Eating their candy
Or starting to pout
A black cat runs past
Crossing your path
The cackle of witches
Flying so fast
Jack-o-lanterns staring
As you pass by
People are screaming
Kids starting to cry
All thing are fright'ning
That truth shall never leave
But everyone is excited 
On all Hallow's Eve

Dripping with sweat
They step off the beach
Back from their run
She's looking so sweet
He slips off her top
And fondles her breasts
So hard to focus
But she does her best
She slides off his shorts
As he does the same 
His fingers run over her
They cannot be tamed
Inside her he slides
Out comes her moans
Their bodies colliding
They're screaming so soon
After a while
They've both been worn out
Now into the showerd
To clean up the sweat
And one more time
For him to get her wet

In this year, I've found a friend
My dear mom, you're Heaven sent
I never thought I'd see the day,
We're best friends is what you'd say
Through thick and thin, you're here for me
And you can always lean on me
When I cry you dry my tears
You help me face my greatest fears
Thanks for what you do for me
I love you more than you can see

Chasten the men
Toss them away
A world without them
To keep us at bay
Now and again
Might make us gay
Their lies and untruths
Simply must go
Think we are fools?
You we will show
Away with these burdens
Far they must fall
Until all flaws of men
No longer stand tall

Eat Eat
Good food's been made
Pray Pray
Be thankful this day
Sleep Sleep
The grub's made us tired
Shop Shop
Such sales to find
Watch Watch
The parade is on
Cheer Cheer
Your team must win this year
Goodbye Goodbye
Our loved ones must leave

Haunted by fears
Followed by pasts
Forced to stay
When she needs to run
Everything's changed
Her heart's worn and torn
No one to turn to
Surviving alone
No friends around her
Old friends don't care
Her past still haunts her
As she lulls through this hell
Holding onto a thread
She has no hope left
Falling apart
She has no hope left

A pile on the floor
The clock is reading four
The bed is shaking
She isn't faking
Those moans are all his fault
But he surely will not hault
It could be love, it could be lust
He's just distracted with her bust
Now the clock says six
They finally got their fix
Her head lies on his chest
And now it's time to rest

::Message to Those Who Read My Poetry::

You might be dissapointed with my sudden lack of writing lately and I apologize for that. I have had some sort of writer's block I think. Not sure, really. I suppose I don't know whether I have writer's block or if I choose not to write subconciously... I will try and write a few poems soon and if they are at least half-decent I shall post them. Again, sorry.
Always,
Bree

It's as beautiful
As a bright blue sky and a blazing sunset
It's as intense
As a brand new baby child
It's as sweet
As an ice cream cone on Independence Day
It's as relaxing
As a lifetime at the spa
It's as soft
As a kitten's fur
It's as amazing
As the Northern Lights
Your kiss

I'm just dreamin'
I'll wake up and I'll see you here
Everything will be alright
Everything will be just fine
I'm just dreamin'
About a broken family
About my momma's bleeding heart
About seperate lives and hateful lies
And a broken family
I'm just dreamin'
I'll wake up and I'll see you here
You'll be standin' over me
Smilin' while I sleep
You'll tuck me in 
Kiss my head goodnight
'Cause I'm just dreamin'
About a broken family
About dead forgotten dreams
About tears and pain
Please someone say
I'm just dreamin'

Like the wax of a candle
Your world drips away
Like the Wicked Witch of the West
All you know melts today
A burning flame
A cold drip of water
Something so small
Becomes so much bigger
Wax makes a puddle 
Ruins your carpet
Witch becomes liquid 
Never to say goodbye
Just a few small pieces
and Your world drips away
Just a couple mistakes
and All you know melts today

Good morning handsome
How were your dreams?
Full of passion and excitement
Exotic quests and lovely scenes?
Open your eyes sweet
The sun is rising
Hear the birds singing your name
and feel my hand touching you?
Good morning handsome
I am so in love with you
You're full of passion and excitement
I feel your hand touching me

He walked into her life
Grasped her soft hand
Locked his eyes with hers
Told her she's beautiful
And not a moment too soon
She broke off failing love
And there he was again
Ready to care for her
Hoping she'd love him
And not a moment too soon
She quickly fell in love
Lost most everything she had
But he was there to hold her
And take care of her too
And not a moment too soon
That man he held her tight
He never let her go
He didn't let the spark die
He wouldn't let this fail
He loved her much too much
She knew she loved him too
Everything will be just fine
Everything always falls in place
And not a moment too soon

Briskly gliding through the forest
Quickly bursting through the doors
Hurried sitting at the table
Just to look up and see you aren't there
I sit and eat from the prepared buffet
Tears streaming down my cheeks in despair
A glance out the window shows the fallen darkness 
I grasp a candle and return where I came
Alone I walk on a candlelit promenade
Bawl through the doors
Crying through the woods 
Back all alone, without you once more

Inhale
Crisp chilled air flows down my throat
Inside my lungs icicles form
Exhale
My nose freezes as the cold air escapes
My insides leak as the ice melts

Left
My foot hits the floor as my heart pumps quick
My mind is spinning as I try to move straight
Right
My knee cracks with the rise of my leg
Just keep refusing to freeze up

Open
Out from my mouth pours millions of truths
My mind is emptying into your ears
Close
Your laughter echos through my bones
In confusion I search for more words

Shut
The door slams in my tear-striped face
Where does such cruelty evolve from
Drop
I wince as my knees slam the cement
How could you just walk away without one care

Inhale
Crisp chilled air flows down my throat
Inside my lungs icicles form
Exhale
My nose freezes as the cold air escapes
My insides leak as the ice melts

Sittin' on the hood of his car
Listenin' to the radio
Drinkin' Coca-Cola
Talkin' about nothing for hours at a time

There should be warning labels on moments in life
Ones that read "Time Of Your Life"
Ones that say "Moment That Will Take Your Breath Away"
Ones that scream "Enjoy While You Can"
There should be warning labels on moments in life

Puffin' that ciggarette
Danglin' our feet in the water
Laughin' at friends
Watchin' the water ripple by

There should be warning labels on moments in life
Ones that read "You'll Never Forget This"
Ones that say "In A Year This Will Make You Cry"
Ones that scream "It Will End All Too Soon"
There should be warning labels on moments in life

Climbin' the bleachers
Holdin' his hand
Ignorin' the game
Chattin' with friends

There should be warning labels on moments in life
Ones that read "Cherish The Time You've Got"
Ones that say "Appreciate Every Single Kiss"
Ones that scream "This Day Will Never Escape Your Mind"
There should be warning labels on moments in life

Yeah, Warning labels would be so nice

The love I still hold is overpowering
My love you forgot never grows old
I'm not holding on but I got my heart stuck
If you could just stop long enough to pull it out
The last night I layed wrapped in your arms
The last day I kissed you soft on the lips
If I'd know that last day was really the last

I want to think I would have told you I loved you
I want to think I would have told you everything I never did
I want to think I would have said so many things
Probably would have let you go 

You aren't mine anymore and I know it's true
I'm strong enough to admit that she won
But do you know I still love you and I always will
I'm calling your name but I can't see your face
I lit all the pictures up in flames that night
Maybe I should have held onto you better
If I just knew where you were I could call you up

I want to think I would tell you I love you
I want to think I would tell you everything I never did
I want to think I would say so many things
Probably would still let you go

Confusion eats at her insides
Her heart rots with pain
Such a choice to be made
By a woman so young
Oh, but his embrace
Panick quickens inside her
Which choice will she make
Just a road now, walked upon
A road, now run upon
Oh, but his sweet embrace
A swift hit
Not 'cross her face
But a blow to the mind
Emotionally abused
Oh, but his loving embrace
Tackled, landed rock bottom
Torn apart by love's hands
And she still grasps his
Holds tight to his hand
Oh, that embrace

He shows admiration
Gives respect
Bestows love
Provides comfort
Reveals truth
Possesses beauty
Offers fulfillment
Mends scars
Restores hope
Expresses opinion 
Allots cherishment
Emanates warmth
Instigates security
And entrusts me with secrets

Behind those eyes
Hides his enigma
Secrets he holds
Death, misfortune, demise
Ambiguity he carries
Decisions and memories
Impenetrable thoughts
Impervious of love
Unmoved by smiles
And refutation of tears

Those scars, ones which run deep under her skin
Scars which cover the scarlet stains
Those scars, ones which once emanated her pain
Scars running cross her thighs
Those scars, ones which abandon her beauty
Scars which she repents
Those scars, which appeal against her mask
Scars christening her being

Dark night
Grey skies
Tears fall
Hope dies
Ring drops
Fist hits
Love's gone
She sits
Past hurts
Trust fails
Stress comes
He bails
Hand leaves
She pines
Tears fall
Hope dies

Slender body
Saunters closer
Beautiful smile
Glowing brightly
Soft supple lips
Touching to mine
Two hearts throbbing
Her hands in mine
You my lovely
Are beautiful
My gorgeous angel
Piece of heaven

Dark as night
Clear as crystal
Cold as ice
He holds the pistol
Breath down her neck
Chills in her spine
Shaking with fear
He holds the pistol
Drop to their knees
The baby kicks
A gunshot is heard
He drops the pistol
The blood runs out
Both of them dying
She cries for her child
He picks up the pistol
Corpses in his hand
Cold, clear night
His dark heart broken
He shoots the pistol

You say you still love me
You say I'm not worth it
You say I am failing
I just say fuck it
He's staring at the girl
Missing her sweet kiss
Knowing he can't have her
He just says fuck it
Such an unhappy ending
A ruined life
With a tear stained face
We all say fuck it

Black rose
Freshly Blooming
Soft to touch
But makes me bleed
Warm to my nose
Whilst I smell the romance
Completely mute
But with such extensive beauty
Sweetly bitter
Is the black rose

Go up in smoke
Like a burning candle
All my memories
Turn to ash
I run to see your face
But the pictures are gone
They went up in smoke 
The smoke floats up
My image of you is distorted
I need to see you again
I need to feel your embrace
And your fingers between mine
Your lips kissing my body
And to hear you whisper in my ear
The blue flames turn orange
Turn the wick to ash
The beauty dissapears
And leaves you forever
I run to see your face
But the pictures are gone
